Just to be clear when you say update, do you mean you will be able to give us an update in a few days on when it will be ready or it will be ready in a few days. We launch next Wednesday so want to get everything closed off in next few days.

And just one more point on the form, you may have picked this up already, but just in case, the second bullet should be I / We

Hi Joel,

just thought I'd add to what David mentioned around the issue with the 'Yes' answer to the 'Are you making this claim on behalf of someone else?' question which appears within the email.

To resolve this issue you would need to send null as the value for the additionalFirstName and additionalLastName properties within the request body instead of an empty string when the user selects 'No' to the question.

Hope this helps!
Jamie

Hi Joel,

Can you send me a copy of the full request you're sending with the error please?

Thank you
Simon
